Scotch Transparent Tape Refills fit into all standard dispensers, glide off the roll smoothly, and cut easily without wasted tape. name: Scotch Sure Start Shipping Packaging Tape, 1.88" x 54.6 yd, Designed for Packing, Shipping and Mailing, Quiet Unwind, No Splitting or Tearing, 3" Core, Clear, 1 Roll (345)
short_description: PACKING TAPE: 1 roll of Scotch Sure Start Packing Tape; unrolls easily and smoothly
DURABLE HOLD: Box tape with a strong, durable hold that keeps your packages and boxes securely sealed, even in rough handling conditions
NO SLIVERING OR SPLITTING: Tape unwinds smoothly every time, without slivering or splitting, to help ease your packing jobs
EASY START: Easy start helps ensure you don't lose the end of the tape, and the quiet unwind is ideal for home or office settings
IDEAL FOR: Great clear tape for shipping packages, sealing moving boxes or packing away seasonal decorations
USE AS A REFILL ROLL: Use to refill a Scotch Brand tape dispenser
PACKAGE CONTENTS: One tape roll that is 1.88 in. x 54.6 yd., on a 3-in. core
SCOTCH BRAND PACKAGING PROTECTION: With a full range of adhesive solutions, Scotch Brand delivers confidence in superior results to get the job done well and effectively the first time
Made locally, with globally sourced materials
Clear when applied to boxes
product_description: Scotch Sure Start Packing Tape comes off the roll easily and smoothly with no slivering or splitting, so you can skip the frustration and get to taping faster. This shipping and moving tape boasts a strong, durable hold that keeps your packages and boxes securely sealed. Never lose the end of the tape again with this Scotch Packing Tape that offers an easy start every time. Whether you're shipping gifts, moving across the country or packing away seasonal decorations, count on this adhesive tape to keep boxes closed, even with rough handling. Each roll of packaging tape unwinds quietly and easily, making it essential for a home or office setting where quiet is critical. This shipping tape has a release coating that helps ensure it unwinds smoothly in one piece, not in little strips. Each roll of packaging protection tape is 1.88 in. x 54.6 yd., on a 3-in. core.
product_details: Recommended Uses For Product ‎When you’re in the middle of packing boxes, the last thing you want to do is search endlessly for the end of the tape. The search is over with Scotch Sure Start Shipping Packaging Tape. This tough, strong tape comes off the roll easily and smoothly with no slivering or splitting. This tape also delivers a smooth and quiet unwind, and when it quietly unwinds off the roll (using the uniquely designed refillable dispenser, included) and is applied to your package, it stays on-keeping your package securely sealed. Clear to the core, Scotch Sure Start Packaging Tape works beautifully for home and office. It stands up to rough handling-but so easy to handle. Scotch Sure Start Shipping Packaging Tape-always easy, always ready to help you get the job done.

name: Scotch Super-Hold Tape, 2 Rolls, Transparent Finish, 50% More Adhesive, Trusted Favorite, 3/4 x 600 Inches, Dispensered (198DM-2)
short_description: STICKS SECURELY - Our most secure tape with 50% more adhesive to stick securely to surfaces like plastic, metal and cardboard (compared to Scotch ¾ Single-Sided Tapes)
STRONG BOND - Delivers a strong bond on contact for a secure, long-lasting hold you can rely on
EASY-TO-APPLY - Designed for easy, no mess application on your tough surfaces or for your DIY project
CLEAR TAPE - Transparent tape is virtually crystal clear so it holds strong without standing out
REUSABLE DISPENSER - Reusable dispenser is compatible with Scotch Tape Refills
MOISTURE RESISTANT - Preserve labels, memories, crafts and more in the in the home, office or classroom
IDEAL FOR MANY USES - Great for use in the home, office and classroom
WRITABLE – Simply write on with permanent markers
SIZE - 3/4 in. x 600 in
Color: Clear
product_description: From sealing envelopes to making quick fixes on the fly, rely on the powerful bond of Scotch Super Hold Tape. Designed with 50% more adhesive, this innovative tape offers a stronger bond than our standard transparent tape (Versus Scotch Cat. 157 Transparent Tape). The thicker backing delivers outstanding durability when a secure, lasting hold is essential. Virtually crystal clear, this tape holds strong without standing out–perfect for repairs, mounting, crafts and more. The convenient dispenser fits comfortably in your hand and lets you unroll and cut your desired amount with ease. Whether you're concealing confidential documents, sealing a small care package, trust what matters to you to the superior adhesion of Scotch Super Hold Tape.
product_details: Recommended Uses For Product ‎Fleet and plant maintenance.
